title: Ferne McCann explores a bamboo forest with Sunday during filming for First Time Mum in Japan
text:
She has had great success with her series First Time Mum, which documents her life as a single mother while juggling her hectic schedule.

And during the fourth series Ferne McCann and her young daughter Sunday will jet to Japan for another adventure, as its revealed the series will return this autumn.

The former TOWIE star, 29, has been sharing snippets of her once-in-a-lifetime trip on social media as she explores the hotspots with her daughter, 22 months, and pals.

Japan bound: During the fourth series Ferne McCann and her young daughter Sunday will jet to Japan for another adventure, as its revealed the series will return this autumn

Ferne, who has been saying at the Four Seasons Hotel Kyoto, shared snaps from inside the hotel as well as out and about at some of the country's incredible sights.

In one of her updates, Ferne posed with her little girl in Arashiyama Bamboo Forest in Kyoto, wearing a stylish white crop top and funky tartan skirt.

The reality star styled her look with a pair of very chunky white boots, while flaunting her enviable gym-honed pins in the thigh-grazing number.

Cute: She has had great success with her series First Time Mum, which documents her life as a single mother while juggling her hectic schedule

Ferne worked her blonde tresses up into a sleek ponytail and opted for a glamorous coat of make-up including a heavy smokey-eye and nude lip.

On Monday ITVBe announced that Ferne McCann: First Time Mum would return for its fourth series in the autumn for a three episode run.

The series will offer another intimate behind-the-scenes look at Ferne's life and journey as a single-parent as her daughter Sunday approaches the 'terrible twos'.

Glam: Ferne, who has been saying at the Four Seasons Hotel Kyoto, shared snaps from inside the hotel as well as out and about at some of the country's incredible sights.

Looking good: In one of her updates, Ferne posed with her little girl wearing a stylish white crop top and funky tartan skirt

On returning to screens, Ferne said 'I've been overwhelmed by the support I've received since opening up about my life and motherhood. I can't wait to show everyone what me and Sunday have been up to!'

Phil Mount, Creative Director at Potato said: 'We're thrilled to be following Ferne and Sunday once again, and giving the viewers another insight into their adventures.'

Ferne's appearance comes after couldn't resist packing on the PDA with kissing Love Island star Jordan Hames, 24, during a boozy cocktail event recently.

The pair could be seen putting on a very cosy display before passionately kissing for all to see.

Ferne, who was last romantically linked to another Love Island star - millionaire Charlie Brake - last year, couldn't resist wrapping her arms around Jordan during the event.

The mother-of-one, who has 22-month-old daughter Sunday with her acid attacker ex Arthur Collins - who is currently serving a 20-year sentence in prison, appeared in good spirits during the night out.

Jordan rose to fame over the summer when he entered the Love Island villa and struck up a romance with ex Anna Vakili.
